carouselLine: Official Municipal Corporation Website – One Platform for Citizen Services
carousel1: Official Municipal Corporation Website – Unified Citizen Services
carousel2: House Tax, Water Tax and Certificates available online
carousel3: Towards a clean, safe and smart city
announce1: Last date for property tax payment is 31 March 2025.
announce2: Water supply maintenance scheduled on 25 March.
announce3: Cleanliness drive initiated across municipal areas.
announce4: New birth and death certificate services launched.
news2: Special drive under Swachh Bharat Mission.
houseTaxDesc: Pay your house tax securely through the online portal.
aboutIntro: The E-Municipal portal has been developed to provide various municipal services to citizens through a digital platform.
aboutMunicipalityDesc: The Municipal Corporation is a local governing body responsible for city administration, development and management of civic amenities. Its primary objective is to build a clean, safe and well-organized city.
visionDesc: To build an ideal city by providing transparent, accountable and digital services to citizens.
missionDesc: To ensure efficient urban development, sanitation, health services, water supply and revenue collection.
function3: Collection of property tax and other revenues
function4: Issuance of birth and death certificates
mayorMessage: Our goal is to provide better services to citizens and make the city clean, beautiful and smart. With citizen cooperation, we can achieve this vision.
contactIntro: For any information, suggestions or grievances related to the Municipal Corporation, citizens may contact us through the details provided below.
citizenHelpDesc: Citizens may register their complaints and suggestions through the helpline number or email. The Municipal Corporation will strive to resolve them at the earliest.
servicesIntro: The Municipal Corporation provides various services to citizens through a simple and digital platform. Citizens may access the services listed below as per their requirements.
service1Desc: Register the birth of a newborn child and obtain a birth certificate.
service2Desc: Apply for registration of death and issuance of death certificate.
service3Desc: Facility to register marriage and obtain marriage certificate.
service4Desc: Pay your property tax through the online portal.
service5Desc: Pay outstanding water tax dues online.
service6Desc: Register complaints and issues related to municipal services.
